review_blob: I also got to try the beers of Brewery Napoleon ("Beer Napoleon") Vantina the island of Elba, I do not know what they are accustomed to drink in Norway, but I think its a good product in both color and flavor , and I must say its a good beer as well as the blonde named Paolina, can certainly be improved, but they are of good beers and certainly appreciated by those like me who loves and knows how to drink beer.
